section.title: Web Settings
section.para: For more details on the built-in web server, see the web server chapter.

row.entry: If enabled, the built-in web server will be started.

The built-in webserver will run on this port, if enabled.
If connecting to multiple Gliders, you can enable a web server for each by specifying a different port.

This is the delay in milliseconds between updates of the web page. This is separate from General->Status Refresh Interval.
This setting should be higher than or equal to the Status Refresh Interval. If it is lower, then the page will reload but the status information will not have been updated.
